any people are affected by autosomal recessive spastic ataxia of Charlevoix-Saguenay ?,"The incidence of ARSACS in the Charlevoix-Saguenay region of Quebec is estimated to be 1 in 1,500 to 2,000 individuals. Outside of Quebec, ARSACS is rare, but the incidence is unknown.",GHR,autosomal recessive spastic ataxia of Charlevoix-Saguenay
